subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Stephon Marbury was not a hero, but an important footnote in the Celtics’ elimination of the Bulls in the greatest first-round series in N.B.A. history.
snippet: Stephon Marbury was not a hero, but an important footnote in the Celtics’ elimination of the Bulls in the greatest first-round series in N.B.A. history.
